region_name: Dodongos Cavern Lobby Beginning
Dodongos Cavern Lobby

locations.Gossip Stone Fairy:
here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)
                and can_summon_gossip_fairy and has_bottle

exits.Dodongos Cavern Lobby North Bridge: at('Dodongos Cavern Lobby North Bridge', can_press_floor_switch)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Baby Dodongo Corridor: here(can_blast_or_smash) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T01', True)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Staircase Ro:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T22',
                at('Dodongos Cavern Lobby East Ledge', can_press_floor_switch)
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 00 T22 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Floor Hole Switch Room:
at('Dodongos Cavern Lobby North Bridge', has_explosives)
                and transition('Dodongos Cavern T08', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Lobby East Ledge
Dodongos Cavern Lobby North Bridge

exits.Dodongos Cavern Lobby East Ledge:
(logic_dc_mq_child_bombs and is_child and can_jumpslash and
                    (damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Lobby North Bridge East
Dodongos Cavern Lobby South Bridge
Dodongos Cavern Baby Dodongo Corridor

locations.Dodongos Cavern GS Scarecrow:
can_use(Scarecrow) or can_use(Longshot) or 
                ((logic_dc_scarecrow_gs or can_climb(160)) and (is_adult or can_child_attack))

exits.Dodongos Cavern Baby Dodongo Corridor No:
can_climb(60) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T20', True
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 01 T20 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Gold Skulltula Torch Roo:
(has_explosives or is_adult or Slingshot or 
                Boomerang or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
                and transition('Dodongos Cavern T13', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Baby Dodongo Corridor North
Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Staircase Room

events.Dodongos Cavern Room 02 Staircase:
has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade 
                or can_use(Dins_Fire) or (logic_dc_staircase and can_use(Bow))

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Staircase Room Top
Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Staircase Room South
Dodongos Cavern Lizalfos Miniboss Room 1F

exits.Dodongos Cavern Baby Dodongo Corridor No:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T10', 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 1'
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T10 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Blue Dodongo Cavern:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T09', 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 1'
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T09 Unbar'
exits.Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room E:
False and transition('Dodongos Cavern T11',
                ('Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 1'
                and 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 2')
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T11 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Double Flame Trap Room:
False and transition('Dodongos Cavern T12',
                ('Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 1'
                and 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 2')
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T12 Unbar')

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Lizalfos Miniboss Room 2F

exits.Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room E:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T11', 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 2'
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T11 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Double Flame Trap Room:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T12', 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 2'
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T12 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Baby Dodongo Corridor No:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T10',
                ('Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 1'
                and 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 2')
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T10 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Blue Dodongo Cavern:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T09',
                ('Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 1'
                and 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 Enemies Wave 2')
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 03 T09 Unbar')

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Blue Dodongo Cavern

exits.Dodongos Cavern Single Business Scrub Ro:
(Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or here(can_blast_or_smash))
                and transition('Dodongos Cavern T15', True)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Lobby East Ledge:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T23', has_fire_source_with_torch
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 04 T23 Unbar')

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Platform Switch with 2 Armos Room

exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Staircase Ro:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T18', can_press_floor_switch
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 05 T18 Unbar')
exits.Dodongos Cavern Lobby South Bridge:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T19', can_press_floor_switch
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 05 T19 Unbar')

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Double Business Scrub Room
Dodongos Cavern Floor Hole Switch Room

exits.Dodongos Cavern Lobby: can_climb(60) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T08', True)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Fire Keese Pushblock Roo: can_climb(60) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T04', True)
exits.King Dodongo Entrance:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T21', can_hold_down_switch
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 07 T21 Unbar')

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Floor Hole Switch Room Ledge

exits.King Dodongo Entrance:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T21', True
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 07 T21 Unbar')

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Fire Keese Pushblock Room

exits.Dodongos Cavern Floor Hole Switch Room: can_climb(60) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T04', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Fire Keese Pushblock Room North

exits.Dodongos Cavern Gold Skulltula Armos Roo: can_climb(60) and here(can_blast_or_smash) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T14', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Fire Keese Pushblock Room West
Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Room

exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Room Upper: can_use(Longshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or (logic_dc_jump and is_adult) or can_climb(120)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Double Business Scrub Ro: can_climb(60) and here(can_blast_or_smash) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T17', True)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room W:
can_climb(60) and (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or here(can_blast_or_smash))
                and transition('Dodongos Cavern T07', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Room Upper

exits.Dodongos Cavern Double Business Scrub Ro: here(can_blast_or_smash) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T17', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room West
Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room

exits.Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room E: can_use(Slingshot) or (is_child and logic_dc_slingshot_skip) or can_use(Bow) or can_climb(120)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Single Flame Trap Room East
Dodongos Cavern Gold Skulltula Torch Room
Dodongos Cavern Double Flame Trap Room

exits.Dodongos Cavern Lizalfos Miniboss Room 2: can_climb(60) and transition('Dodongos Cavern T12', True)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Room Upper:
(can_use(Slingshot) or (is_child and logic_dc_slingshot_skip)
                or can_use(Bow) or can_climb(120))
                and transition('Dodongos Cavern T06', True)

region_name: Dodongos Cavern Single Business Scrub Room
Dodongos Cavern Gold Skulltula Armos Room
Dodongos Cavern Compass Room

events.Dodongos Cavern Room 15 Enemies: Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or have a way to kill armos

exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Staircase Ro:
transition('Dodongos Cavern T16', 'Dodongos Cavern Room 15 Enemies'
                or 'Dodongos Cavern Room 15 T16 Unbar')
